pma:database.name: smiley
pma:database.pma:table: CREATE TABLE `messages` ( `ID` int(5) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `name` varchar(50) COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL, `email` varchar(50) COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL, `message` text COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL, `phone` varchar(12) COLLATE utf8_bin NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`ID`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=23 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_bin;
